messages.title: The choice in Newark will be between Remain or Leave
messages.content: The Lib Dems have led the fight locally and nationally against Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Lib Dem majority Government would revoke Article 50 and stop Brexit. Shutting down Parliament was undemocratic. Trying to force through a sham deal without scrutiny sidelined Parliament. Revoking Brexit will be catastrophic for the NHS, jobs and public services.
Tackling climate change is more urgent than stopping Brexit.

mentions.candidate: David Watts, Parliamentary candidate for Newark, said: ‘Use your vote to stop Brexit. Vote Liberal Democrat.’
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Prime Minister Boris Johnson backed by Nigel Farage and Jacob Rees-Mogg.
mentions.tacticalSituation: In the EU elections the Lib Dems polled double the Labour vote in Newark and Sherwood.

issues.brexitEurope: Prime Minister Boris Johnson backed by Nigel Farage and Jacob Rees-Mogg want to do an ideal Brexit costing this country. Revoking Brexit will be catastrophic for the NHS, jobs and public services.
issues.economy: We want Britain to remain in the EU because it's best for our economy.
issues.environment: It's best for our economy, fighting climate change, protecting our rights and public services.
issues.health: Revoking Brexit will be catastrophic for the NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: In Newark the Liberal Democrats are the strongest Remain party and the best placed to stop Brexit.

politicalExperience.achievements: I've led opposition to Brexit for over three years.

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dems polled double the Labour vote in Newark and Sherwood.

quotes.text: Use your vote to stop Brexit. Vote Liberal Democrat.
